text: What are the properties required for a HME filter? e Must have been tested using saline test (ISO 9360-1:2000) e 99,97% efficiency at 30L/min e P limit 60cmH20 (or 20cmH20 above breathing circuit) e Minimum humidity: o 20g/m3 if ventilated <10h o 33g/m3if ICU ventilated >10h e Dead space should be appropriate for TV if low flows e Should be hydrophobic, pleated filter (NOT ELECTROSTATIC = virus and bacteria and liquid can get through) e Paeds: lower weight limits o HME: Skg o Just filter: 3kg
